ERR.EXISTS: There is already an auth client with this code, please enter a new code, or edit existing.

DELETE.CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete this auth client ?
DELETE.ERROR: Could not delete auth client, please try again.

ADD.TITLE: Add Client
ADD.ERROR: Could not add new auth client.

CODE.NAME: Code
CODE.DESCRIPTION: An internal machine identifiable code for this client that needs to be unique for this domain.

DESCRIPTION.NAME: Description
DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION: Description what this client will be used for.

USERNAME.NAME: Username
USERNAME.DESCRIPTION: The username that should be used for this client.

PASSWORD.NAME: Password
PASSWORD.DESCRIPTION: The password that should be used for this client.

GUID.NAME: Guid
GUID.DESCRIPTION: The guid for this client, used in the clientId field when authenticating. This is derived from the domain machine name and the code.
